name: PATIENCE!!!
description:
Inspired by simple metal wire game from Mr Bean Series

I created minimalism simple game with primitive shapes, currently contain 15 challenging levels to complete with PATIENCE. Level will be added more over time if needed.

Each level automaticaly save progress so player cannot lose progress when exiting the page.

there is no settings, no complex UI, no level choose, no level number. Just game to be Complete

Controls:

Touch Input or Mouse input

Made within 2 hours work time
